definitions.definition: movement to an improved or more developed state, or to a forward position:
examples: Technological progress has been so rapid over the last few years.
Repair work is in progress on the south-bound lane of the motorway and will continue until June.

definitions.definition: to improve or develop in skills, knowledge, etc.:
examples: My Spanish never really progressed beyond the stage of being able to order drinks at the bar.
As the war progressed, more and more countries became involved.
